response.original_title: Doctor Who and the Collectors: Part three - The 1980s
response.overview: Hosted by Emily Cook, this third instalment of The Collectors series explores the world of 1980s Doctor Who fandom through the memorabilia, merchandise and treasured artefacts kept by fans of the era. From rare collectibles to homemade ephemera, the documentary celebrates how the show was preserved, enjoyed and obsessively gathered in the decade of VHS, conventions and Target books. A warm, affectionate snapshot of pre-internet fandom and the people who helped keep the programmeâ€™s spirit alive between broadcasts.
response.title: Doctor Who and the Collectors: Part three - The 1980s
